data.eml:eml: On the identity of the generic name Iulidesmus Silvestri, 1895 (Polydesmida: Paradoxosomatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hoffman, Richard L. (2012): On the identity of the generic name Iulidesmus Silvestri, 1895 (Polydesmida: Paradoxosomatidae). Zootaxa 3204: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209709
